title: Winter of the Ice Wizard
description: A chilling rescue mission!Merlin the magician and Morgan le Fay have disappeared! To find them, Jack and Annie journey with their friends Teddy and Kathleen to the Land-Behind-the-Clouds, a frozen kingdom of ice and snow. There they find out that the Ice Wizard has stolen Merlin's Staff of Strength, and he won't give it back until Jack and Annie find his missing eye! If Jack and Annie don't return with the Ice Wizard's eye before sunrise, Merlin and Morgan will disappear forever! Can they complete their mission in time?-from the back cover
author: Mary Pope Osborne
